name: Modern Standard Chinese II
description: This course is a continuation of EAS100Y1. Students learn major grammatical structures which are not introduced in the first year and expand their vocabulary. Interviews are required of students who wish to enrol in the course, except for students who have the minimum grade in the prerequisite. See eas.utoronto.ca/languages/chinese for details.
prerequisites: EAS100Y1 (minimum grade 67%)/equivalent as determined by a Chinese placement interview
